sense.name: An electrical device that provides a path for current to flow.
sense.examples: We have to position the circuit correctly in the device. Making an electrical circuit is a tough engineering problem.

sense.name: The act of making a route around a particular area or to certain stops.
sense.examples: They took a circuit of European resorts. The judge makes a circuit of the courts in his district. He drove an extra circuit around the track.

sense.name: The boundary line encompassing an area or object.
sense.examples: He had walked the full circuit of his property. It is a danger to everyone over the circuit of the globe.

sense.name: (Law) a judicial division of a state or the United States.
sense.examples: A circuit is covered by one court of appeals.

sense.name: A racetrack for automobile races.
sense.examples: It is a challenging circuit to run. The Indy 500 is on the same famous circuit each year.
